argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: Indicates whether the operation was successful.

page.description: Gather statistical information about the actual table.
page.discussion: The UpdateStatistics() method gathers information on the table for the specified connection. A successful call to UpdateStatistics()will set the LastKnownRowCount property and the MaximumActualLength (for character and binary columns) property for each DataTypeInfo(Column). Limitations: Desktop applications only.
